promptTexts.text: Task: You are initializing File 002 (Snow White). Instructions: Write this exact introduction (do not change the meaning, but you can add robotic beeps): "Greetings. I have accessed File 002. This file contains a story about mirrors, poison, and sleeping. However, the data is severely damaged. I need you to provide new variables to make the story work again. Please wait for the microphone before speaking. I will need 4 or 5 words for each chapter. Let us begin."
